main event: Multiple people observed a round, changing-color object moving rapidly in the sky over Whitesboro, New York on July 26, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as being round and changing color from reddish glow to bright white light.
The object moved rapidly and disappeared over the eastern horizon.
The object was sighted again the following night, July 27, 1964, moving rapidly and ascending in the western sky.
Later that same night, two of these objects were observed, one of which paused before disappearing in the southwest.
The Air Force suggested obtaining radar echo schedules for the night of July 27, 1964 to potentially correlate with the observations.
